org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hdfs.simpleauth

Class SimpleAuthAvroHDFSFileSource<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Source<T>
      • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.BoundedSource<KV<K,V>>
        • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hdfs.HDFSFileSource<org.apache.avro.mapred.AvroKey<T>,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
          • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hdfs.AvroHDFSFileSource<T>
            • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hdfs.simpleauth.SimpleAuthAvroHDFSFileSource<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, HasDisplayData

    public class SimpleAuthAvroHDFSFileSource<T>
extends AvroHDFSFileSource<T>
    Source for Avros on Hadoop/HDFS with Simple Authentication. Allows to set arbitrary username as HDFS user, which is used for reading Avro from HDFS.
    See Also:
